snippet: BLAUSTEIN--Helen, passed away on January 18, 2016. She was a beloved mother, a devoted wife, an incredible grandmother and a wonderful friend. Though she is no longer physically with us, her spirit lives on in those fortunate enough to have known her. There will be a memorial service for her this Sunday at 1pm at Riverside Chapel, 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
